title: Antonio Arias (footballer)
text:
Antonio Arias Mujica (born October 9, 1944) is a Chilean former <a href="association%20football">football</a> defender, who played for the <a href="Chile%20national%20football%20team">Chile national team</a> between 1968 and 1973, gaining 30 caps. He was part of the Chilean squad for the <a href="1974%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1974 World Cup</a>.
At club level, Arias played for <a href="Club%20Deportivo%20Magallanes">Magallanes</a> and <a href="Uni%C3%B3n%20Espa%C3%B1ola">Unión Española</a>.
